knimeNode.name: GA Management List Users
knimeNode.shortDescription: Lists active users for a Google Analytics profile, property or account.

fullDescription.intro: Lists active users for a Google Analytics profile, property or account. Level of interest is specified via configuration.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: Level to retrieve users for - either profile, property or account.

ports.outPort: Users that have access to GA Account, Property and Profiles
